io.amcp.messaging

Interface EventBroker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryEventBroker

    public interface EventBroker
    Abstract interface for event broker implementations in AMCP. Provides a unified API for different messaging systems (Solace, Kafka, NATS).
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EventBroker.Acknowledgment
      Acknowledgment interface for message delivery confirmation.
      static interface  EventBroker.BrokerConfig
      Configuration information for the broker connection.
      static interface  EventBroker.BrokerInfo
      Information about the broker implementation and capabilities.
      static interface  EventBroker.Publisher
      Publisher interface for sending events.
      static interface  EventBroker.Subscriber
      Subscriber interface for receiving events.
      static interface  EventBroker.Subscription
      Subscription handle for managing topic subscriptions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<Void> connect(EventBroker.BrokerConfig config)
      Connects to the event broker using the provided configuration.
      EventBroker.Publisher createPublisher(String publisherId)
      Creates a publisher for sending events.
      EventBroker.Subscriber createSubscriber(String subscriberId)
      Creates a subscriber for receiving events.
      CompletableFuture<Void> disconnect()
      Disconnects from the event broker.

      Gets broker-specific information and capabilities.

      Checks if the broker connection is active.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        CompletableFuture<Void> connect(EventBroker.BrokerConfig config)
        Connects to the event broker using the provided configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - broker connection configuration
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when connected

      • disconnect

        CompletableFuture<Void> disconnect()
        Disconnects from the event broker.
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completes when disconnected

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Checks if the broker connection is active.
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise

      • createPublisher

        EventBroker.Publisher createPublisher(String publisherId)
        Creates a publisher for sending events.
        Parameters:
        publisherId - unique identifier for the publisher
        Returns:
        Publisher instance

      • createSubscriber

        EventBroker.Subscriber createSubscriber(String subscriberId)
        Creates a subscriber for receiving events.
        Parameters:
        subscriberId - unique identifier for the subscriber
        Returns:
        Subscriber instance

      • getBrokerInfo

        EventBroker.BrokerInfo getBrokerInfo()
        Gets broker-specific information and capabilities.
        Returns:
        metadata about the broker implementation
